title: The Original OneLANE
name: The Original OneLANE
description:
A Map by Bikerbudmatt

This is the 1998 One Lap Around New England Bicycle Tour.

properties.name: Andover Newton Theological School
properties.description: Posted by Bikerbudmatt  210 Herrick Road, Newton Center, MA, 02459Andover Newton Theological School

properties.name: Centre Congregational Church
properties.description: Posted by Bikerbudmatt193 Main St, Brattleboro, VTOur second stop in Brattleboro, Vermont. Every OneLANE trip has stopped here.

properties.name: First Cong. Church, Kittery Point, ME
properties.description: Posted by Bikerbudmatt23 Pepperrell Rd,Kittery Point,MEOur seventh stop. We stayed at this church on every tour.

properties.name: First Cong. UCC, Rochester, NH
properties.description: Posted by Bikerbudmatt63 S Main St,Rochester,NHOur fifth stop. We stopped here for the first two tours.

properties.name: First Congregational Church
properties.description: Posted by Bikerbudmatt837 main st,east hartford, ctStarting and ending point for OneLANE 1998

properties.name: Newman Congregational Church
properties.description: Posted by Bikerbudmatt100 Newman Avenue, Rumford, RI, 02916Newman Congregational Church

properties.name: South Congregational Church
properties.description: Posted by Bikerbudmatt27 Pleasant St, Concord, NHOur fourth stop. This church has been on most of our tours, except for the second when they had a fire not long before we were to arrive.

properties.name: Storrs Congregational Church
properties.description: Posted by Bikerbudmatt2 N Eagleville RD, 06268UConn Campus Church, UCC. Twelfth and final overnight stop on our tour. We stayed here for all of our tours.

properties.name: Swift Family Camp
properties.description: Posted by Bikerbudmatt Acton,MEOur sixth stop and layover. We stayed with this wonderful family for our first tour only.

properties.name: Topsfield Congregational Church
properties.description: Posted by Bikerbudmatt9 E Common St, 01983This is our ninth stop on the 1998 tour. We only stayed here once.

properties.name: United Church of Christ Keene
properties.description: Posted by Bikerbudmatt23 Central SQ,Keene, NHOur third stop. This stop has been on every OneLANE tour.

properties.name: United Congregational Church
properties.description: Posted by Bikerbudmatt395 High St, Holyoke, MAFirst stop. We only stopped at Holyoke on our first tour.
